## Workspace.getPotentialVariableMap() method

Return the variable map that contains "potential" variables. These exist in the flyout but not in the workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPotentialVariableMap(): IVariableMap<IVariableModel<IVariableState>> | null;
```
**Returns:**

[IVariableMap](./blockly.ivariablemap_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate_interface.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt; \| null

The potential variable map.
